Function nseMetacommunitySpeciesWithAbundance¶

  • Defined in File neutral_analytical.cpp

Function Documentation¶

long double neutral_analytical::nseMetacommunitySpeciesWithAbundance(const unsigned long &n, const unsigned long &community_size, const long double &speciation_rate)¶

Calculate the expected number of species with abundance n within a non-spatially explicit neutral model.

Implementation of the SAD approximation from Vallade and Houchmandzadeh (2003).

Return
the number of species with abundance n
Parameters
  • n: the number of individuals expected within the species
  • community_size: the total number of individuals in the community
  • speciation_rate: the speciation rate
